extendedInfo.description: The Pocket Change shop allows you to check your current token balance and redeem tokens for rewards.If you have any problems with your rewards or token balance please contact support@pocketchange.com.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I love this app. Got it in my phone for 2 years now. Its cool... Now if we can get pocket change for envites to friends that would top this app top 1 in all money making apps... Great job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and Fun
reviews.comment: PC offers many easy and fun ways to earn coins for prizes. You just play your favorite PC games and the coins stack up quickly. It is simple and easy to build funds for great prizes.
reviews.author: Ian Taylor

reviews.title: Dissapointed
reviews.comment: I have been downloading and playin apps everyday now and i dont get all the tokens which are said to be given. I dont even get the every day reward... And it\'s not because i reached my limit nor a old version or what so ever... I\'m missin atleast 200 tokens for every game i played DAILY with 24hours between... i\'m really upset with this...
reviews.author: Shane Lunsford

reviews.title: Good... until
reviews.comment: So, let me just by saying that you aren\'t going to become a millionaire by using this app. There are much easier ways to make money (GPT, Surveys, etc) but as for a few quick bucks, this isn\'t bad. My one complaint is that when I reached 2,000 PC ($20) the Amazon Gift Card \"mysteriously\" disappeared. If this is a scam, it\'s very fooling. Either that or let me get my gift card.
reviews.author: Tim Horton

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: Its cool how you can just save pocket change and buy something great! I love it
reviews.author: Tina King

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Cool way to learn about nnew apps and make the best with your phone and earn tokens too.
reviews.author: Ryan Barr

reviews.title: Great! But...
reviews.comment: Its too hard to get Pc!! I wanna get the Dr. Dre beats but its so hard coz its 25,000 pc!!! Can you please make some of the prices a little lower, like there is a possibility for us to get those things?!?!?!?!? Sorry for the complains though but all of the complains are true!
reviews.author: Laksmi Lim

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Well made app, intelligent design. I recommend it.
reviews.author: Kaden Zipfel

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a good app, cool easy to use but doesn\'t do anything more then the other apps like it.
reviews.author: Phillip Alva

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: Cool App, I just wish better apps were integrated with it.
reviews.author: Reid Chunn

reviews.title: Some suggestions
reviews.comment: Kindly add some rewards between 1000 to 5000 points. Also increase the daily limit of 125 points. It should be minimum 200 per day. Moreover daily limit of 30 per 24 hours should be changed to 30 per 12 hours. This will be good for you as people will use the apps twice a day. Thankyou. Waiting to hear from your side.
reviews.author: RumMan Saeed

reviews.title: Great, need more things in the store
reviews.comment: Great app but needs some improvements please add more amazon and Google play gift cards of different amounts?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: But takes so long. Got over 2000 and need 10000 for a google play gift card. Still a great app
reviews.author: neil stefanyk

reviews.title: Rewards unavailable
reviews.comment: I would like to rate this app highly but whenever I try to redeem any rewards worth over 200 pc, it simply won\'t go to the description screen for that reward, meaning I can\'t redeem it. I just got 2000 and would like my Amazon gift card, so please fix this! Thank you.
reviews.author: Kris Pieper

reviews.title: Wasted my time!
reviews.comment: I saved up >2000 points ssslowly for over 5 months. The store contains nothing that I can use. I\'ve sent a couple of emails but no response. Don\'t waste your time!
reviews.author: mark crawford

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I love the pocket change app....fairly easy to earn points...redeemed for a $20 amazon card and got the redemtion code within an hour...although now I don\'t see that the amazon card is even offered anymore unless there is a limit....and the other con that i found was that some apps that claim to support pocket change I haven\'t been able  to get my points rewarded but overall good app!
reviews.author: Peggy DiMatteo

reviews.title: Love it can\'t wait to get something
reviews.comment: I only have 600 coins. There should be more rewards that you can claim. It goes from 700 coins and then to 7500 please let there be some in the middle  :-)
reviews.author: Veronica Cummins

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Hey Thanks you vey much, because this is the easiest wat I found out to get rewarded, but I have a question: How many points can I get daily and in what ways I can get that amount of points? To PC users: Patience brings rewards ;) (Sorry for my poor English)
reviews.author: Diego Jose Tejada Rodriguez

reviews.title: This totally stupid app
reviews.comment: I had 10.000 points in this app and I change it into Google play store gift card 2 days ago and I still wait so fix it or I will uninstall it
reviews.author: Mohamed Hfaiedh

reviews.title: Great. Simple. DELICIOUS.
reviews.comment: The simplest and greatest idea for apps. Ever. Now if only xbox would pick up on it...
reviews.author: Steven Qualls
